amlPlate.title: We can verify exchanges in accordance with

body.first: If the transaction is identified as risky, we can suspend the exchange operation and ask to go through the identification procedure.
body.second: If the payment is received after the cancellation of the application, you may be offered a refund or resumption of the exchange at the new rate.

footer.title: We have been changing since 2007
footer.description: In the same year, a certain Satoshi Nakamoto announced that he had begun working on the concept of a new monetary system, named by the author as Bitcoin

waiting.title: Ожидание оплаты
waiting.pay: Pay the application before the end of this time
waiting.address: This address is for receiving only
waiting.made: If you have already made the transfer, wait for the payment to be processed.
waiting.registered: We'll see your payment and continue exchange after transaction will be registered in the network.
waiting.qr: QR code for payment through the application

payment.auto: We check the payment automatically so that you do not have to refresh the page.

text.thanks: Thank you for your trust and for using the service. We will be glad to see you again. If you liked our service, please
text.link: leave a short review for us.

body.review: Give us a short feedback about our work and take part in a drawing for 25000 rubles. In 0 d. 20 h. 35 m. and 12 s our smart contract will choose new winners. You could be one of them!

body.text: If the payment was made after the transaction cancellation, or our service does not see the payment for other reasons, please don’t worry, we will find your payment in manual mode.

support.text: Please create a ticket in our

body.reply: The operators will respond to your message, find a payment and complete the exchange.
